content: आथर्वण {%<ab>a.</ab>%} (णी|{%<ab>f.</ab>%}) [अथर्वणा मुनिना दृष्टः वेदः अण् आथर्वणः तमधीते वेत्ति वा अण् <ls>P. IV. 3. 133</ls>] Originating from, relating or belonging to, the Atharvaveda or the Atharvans. --णः {@--1@} A Brāhmaṇa knowing or studying the Atharvaveda. {@--2@} A descendant of Atharvan. {@--3@} A priest whose ritual is comprised in the Atharvaveda. {@--4@} The Atharvaveda itself (अथर्वणां समूहः). {@--5@} A housepriest. --णं A private room in which the sacrificer is informed of the happy event of the sacrifice by the officiating Brāhmaṇa.
